Package it.polimi.se2019.controller

Class PaymentController

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2019.controller.Observer
      • it.polimi.se2019.controller.PaymentController
  • public class PaymentController
extends Observer
    Handles the payment of ammos. Supports paying using ammos + powerups, or just powerups. If the payment can't be processed because too few powerUps were sent, it notifies the observer to stop. If the payment is processed, it notifies the observer to process the action after the payment.

        Returns:

      • startPaying

        public void startPaying()
        Set up the payment.
      • If no ammos need to be payed, it ends.
      • If ammos can be payed without the use of PowerUps, it removes ammo from the player and proceeds.
      • If ammos can be payed with the use (needed or optional) of powerUps, it prompt the user with the needed powerUps.

  • updateOnPowerUps

    public void updateOnPowerUps​(java.util.List<PowerUp> powerUps)
    After checking that the powerUps are compatible, it concludes the payment. Otherwise, the timer restarts prompting the user with the related message.
    Overrides:
    updateOnPowerUps in class Observer
    Parameters:
    powerUps -
